New Records: Trae Young hit a buzzer-beating 3-pointer from beyond the halfcourt line to give the Atlanta Hawks a 124-121 victory over the Utah Jazz.
Key Match Events: Trae Young hit a buzzer-beating 3-pointer from beyond the halfcourt line to give the Atlanta Hawks a 124-121 victory over the Utah Jazz.
Young finished with 24 points and 20 assists.
Lauri Markkanen made a season-high eight 3-pointers and scored a season-best 35 points for Utah.
Pre-Game Insights: No pre-game insights mentioned in the article.
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match reflections mentioned in the article.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Young took an inbounds pass, dribbled to just short of halfcourt and hit the 49-foot winner as time expired while being loosely guarded by Collin Sexton.
Others: The Atlanta Hawks snapped a three-game skid with the win.
Collin Sexton had seemingly forced overtime with a tying 3-pointer with four seconds remaining.
